title: FS 1909 PC758 Max Stein NY Highlanders **SOLD**
author: 27 Championships

posts.post_title: FS 1909 PC758 Max Stein NY Highlanders **SOLD**
posts.post_content:
Hello to all you NY Highlander collectors out there. I will be listing for sale the rarities and high value cards in my collection in order to help finance my daughter’s graduate school tuition. I just cannot in good conscience allow her to take out a student loan and go into debt. So here is the first batch of cards I have for sale listed in the appropriate forum category.

1909 PC758 Max Stein Postcards Frank Chance SGC 40 **SOLD**

Please pm for scans/photos. Free shipping
